attributes.action: Do not debate, or act upon, the petition to deselect Yvette Cooper.
attributes.background:
It has come to our attention that a petition has been created to start a debate on deselecting Yvette Cooper. 

In light of recent events - in which a bill she supported passed in commons, passed in the house of lords and received royal assent - we request that the petition in question be ignored.

rejection.details: The selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament, so we can't accept petitions about it.
